title: How to resolve Log-in issues?
body:
I can't seem to get passed the Log-in screen. It says nothing but "Authenticating" for several minutes and then gives me an error message. I did the Repair All and even uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail. 

Anyone have a fix for this yet?

replies.body: This is generally a network connection that's getting blocked from reaching the authentication service.  A reinstall wouldn't really fix this because that deals with game files, and not connection.  Instead, I recommend going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions about that.  :D
